title: Daniel Boone (1936 Western) starring John Carradine | Directed by David Howard

sources.title: Daniel Boone (1936 Western) starring John Carradine | Directed by David Howard
sources.description:
Daniel Boone, a courageous frontiersman, guides a group of settlers across treacherous terrain to build a new home in uncharted territory. Along the way, they face challenges from rival groups, internal conflicts, and the harsh wilderness. Boone's leadership and determination unite the settlers as they fight to survive and secure their future.

Colorized version: https://youtu.be/H3kQhG7Lio0


Director: David Howard
Writers: Edgecumb Pinchon, Daniel Jarrett
Stars: George O'Brien, Heather Angel, John Carradine
Genres: Biography, Drama, History, Western


00:00 - Full movie with subtitles 
01:05 - Daniel Boone leads settlers on a perilous journey to establish a new home in uncharted territory.
05:07 - Boone inspires the settlers with a prayer for peace and guidance as they prepare to cross the mountains.
16:28 - Simon Girty is captured and accused of inciting violence against settlers, sparking tension.
37:53 - Boone declares the chosen valley as their new home, marking the settlers' triumph over adversity.
47:02 - A proclamation from Virginia threatens the settlers' land claims, creating a new challenge.
1:00:21 - The settlers face a massive attack from Native tribes, testing their unity and resilience.
1:07:13 - Boone rallies the settlers to hold their ground despite dwindling resources and mounting pressure.
1:09:50 - The settlers achieve victory and secure their new home, celebrating their hard-fought success.


@CultCinemaClassics
